instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1989: What is A1989? A1989 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2018, 2019 with EMC 3124, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00850..
definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar and Keyboard light stop Working
threads.message:
Hi Everyone
Client took Macbook to local computer shop, They replaced <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Screen on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Model 2018, after replacing they realize screen model given was wrong, so they replaced back to <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Screen, Now screen is working fine, brightness is also controlling fine but after that Touchbar and keyboard backlight not working at all. 
Any clue where should I start ?
Thanks
